productText:
000
FZUS52 KMFL 152001
CWFMFL

Coastal Waters Forecast for Florida
National Weather Service Miami FL
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

Atlantic coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Ocean Reef out to
60 nm and Gulf coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee
out 20 nm and Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach out 60 nm...including
the waters of Biscayne Bay and Lake Okeechobee.

Seas are provided as a range of the average height of the highest
1/3 of the waves...along with the occasional height of the
average highest 10 percent of the waves. 

AMZ600-GMZ606-160900-
Synopsis for Jupiter Inlet to Ocean Reef FL out to 60 nm and for East
Cape Sable to Bonita Beach FL out to 60 nm-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.Synopsis...

A moderate south to southwesterly wind flow will continue across the
local waters through the end of the week and into the upcoming 
weekend. Scattered showers and thunderstorms will be possible each 
day. Any thunderstorms that form could produce brief periods of 
rough seas and gusty winds.

Gulf Stream Hazards: None.

The approximate location of the west wall of the Gulf Stream as of
Jun 15, 2023 at 12 UTC...

The approximate location of the Gulf Stream is currently
unavailable.

This data courtesy of the Naval Oceanographic Office.

$$

AMZ650-670-160900-
Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM-
Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...SMALL CRAFT SHOULD EXERCISE CAUTION...

.TONIGHT...Winds S SW winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts to around
25 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Period 3 seconds. Intracoastal waters
light chop. A chance of showers and tstms in the evening. 
.FRI...SW winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt. Seas 1 to
2 ft. Period 3 seconds. Intracoastal waters a light chop. A chance
of showers and tstms in the afternoon. 
.FRI NIGHT...W SW winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt.
Seas 1 to 2 ft. Period 3 seconds. Intracoastal waters a light chop.
A chance of showers and tstms. 
.SAT...SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 2 to 3 ft. Period 6 seconds.
Intracoastal waters a light chop. A chance of tstms in the morning.
Showers. Tstms likely in the afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...SW winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt.
Seas 2 to 3 ft. Intracoastal waters a light chop. Showers with
tstms likely. 
.SUN...S SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 2 to 3 ft. Intracoastal
waters a light chop. Showers with tstms likely. 
.SUN NIGHT...S SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Intracoastal
waters a light chop. Showers likely with a chance of tstms. 
.MON...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 foot. Intracoastal waters
light chop. Showers likely with a chance of tstms. 
.MON NIGHT...S SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 1 foot. Intracoastal
waters a light chop. A chance of tstms in the evening. A chance of
showers through the night. A slight chance of tstms after
midnight. 
.TUE AND TUE NIGHT...S winds 5 to 10 kt along the coast to S
10 to 15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt in the Gulf Stream. Seas
1 to 2 ft. Intracoastal waters a light chop. Showers likely with a
chance of tstms.  

$$

AMZ651-671-160900-
Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM-
Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM
excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

...SMALL CRAFT SHOULD EXERCISE CAUTION...

.TONIGHT...S SW winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts to around 25 kt
along the coast to S SW 15 to 20 kt with gusts to around 20 kt in
the Gulf Stream. Seas 1 foot. Period 3 seconds. Intracoastal
waters a light chop. 
.FRI...SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 1 foot. Period 3 seconds.
Intracoastal waters a light chop. A slight chance of showers and
tstms in the afternoon. 
.FRI NIGHT...W SW winds 10 to 15 kt along the coast to W SW 10 to
15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt in the Gulf Stream. Seas 1 foot.
Period 2 seconds. Intracoastal waters a light chop. A slight chance
of showers and tstms in the evening, then a chance of showers and
tstms after midnight. 
.SAT...SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Period 4 seconds.
Intracoastal waters a light chop. A chance of tstms in the morning.
Showers likely. Tstms likely in the afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...SW winds 10 to 15 kt along the coast to SW 10 to
15 kt with gusts to around 20 kt in the Gulf Stream. Seas 1 to
2 ft. Intracoastal waters a light chop. Showers and tstms likely. 
.SUN...Winds S SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Gusts up to 20 kt in the
afternoon. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Intracoastal waters a light chop.
Showers with tstms likely. 
.SUN NIGHT...Along the coast, S SW winds 10 to 15 kt becoming SW
around 5 kt after midnight. In the Gulf Stream, S SW winds 5 to
10 kt, Gusts up to 20 kt in the evening. Seas 1 to 2 ft.
Intracoastal waters a light chop. Showers likely in the evening. A
chance of tstms through the night. A chance of showers after
midnight. 
.MON...S winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Intracoastal waters
light chop. Showers likely with a chance of tstms. 
.MON NIGHT THROUGH TUE NIGHT...S SE winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to
2 ft. Intracoastal waters a light chop. A chance of showers and
tstms.  

$$

GMZ656-657-676-160900-
Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM-
Coastal waters from East Cape Sable to Chokoloskee FL out 20 NM-
Waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.TONIGHT...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 foot. Period 3 seconds.
Bay and inland waters a light chop. 
.FRI...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 foot. Period 3 seconds. Bay
and inland waters a light chop. A slight chance of showers and
tstms in the morning, then a chance of showers and tstms in the
afternoon. 
.FRI NIGHT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Period
4 seconds. Bay and inland waters a light chop. A chance of showers
and tstms. 
.SAT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Period 5 seconds.
Bay and inland waters a light chop. A chance of tstms in the
morning. Showers likely. Tstms likely in the
afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Bay and
inland waters a light chop. Tstms likely in the evening. Showers
through the night. A chance of tstms after midnight. 
.SUN...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Bay and inland
waters a light chop. A chance of tstms in the morning. Showers
likely. Tstms likely in the afternoon. 
.SUN NIGHT AND MON...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Bay and
inland waters a light chop. Showers likely with a chance of tstms. 
.MON NIGHT AND TUE...S winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Bay and
inland waters a light chop. A chance of showers and tstms. 
.TUE NIGHT...S SE winds 5 to 10 kt. Seas 1 to 2 ft. Bay and
inland waters a light chop. A chance of showers and tstms.  

$$

AMZ610-160900-
Lake Okeechobee-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.TONIGHT...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance
of showers and tstms in the evening. 
.FRI...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance of
showers and tstms in the afternoon. 
.FRI NIGHT...W SW winds 10 to 15 kt. Lake waters a moderate chop.
A slight chance of showers and tstms in the evening, then a
chance of showers and tstms after midnight. 
.SAT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance of
tstms in the morning. Showers. Tstms in the
afternoon. 
.SAT NIGHT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A
chance of showers and tstms. 
.SUN...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance of
showers and tstms in the morning, then showers and tstms in the
afternoon. 
.SUN NIGHT...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A
chance of showers and tstms in the evening. 
.MON...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance of
showers and tstms in the morning, then showers and tstms in the
afternoon. 
.MON NIGHT...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A
chance of showers and tstms in the evening.
.TUE...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance of
showers and tstms in the morning, then showers and tstms likely
in the afternoon. 
.TUE NIGHT...S winds 5 to 10 kt. Lake waters a light chop. A chance
of showers and tstms in the evening.  

$$

AMZ630-160900-
Biscayne Bay-
400 PM EDT Thu Jun 15 2023

.TONIGHT...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. 
.FRI...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A slight
chance of showers in the morning. A chance of tstms through the
day. A chance of showers in the afternoon. 
.FRI NIGHT...W SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A
slight chance of showers and tstms after midnight. 
.SAT...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. Showers and
tstms likely. 
.SAT NIGHT...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. Tstms
likely in the evening. Showers likely through the night. A chance
of tstms after midnight. 
.SUN...S SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. Showers with
tstms likely. 
.SUN NIGHT...SW winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A chance
of showers and tstms. 
.MON...S winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A chance of
tstms in the morning. Showers likely. Tstms
likely in the afternoon. 
.MON NIGHT...S winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A chance
of showers and tstms, mainly in the evening. 
.TUE...S SE winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A chance of
showers and tstms in the morning, then showers and tstms likely
in the afternoon. 
.TUE NIGHT...S SE winds 5 to 10 kt. Bay waters a light chop. A
chance of showers and tstms.  

$$
